titles.title: Expressing support for the goals and ideals of National Family Caregivers Month.
Expressing support for the goals and ideals of National Family Caregivers Month.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

bill.summary:
Honors the work of America's family caregivers.
Acknowleges the enormous savings to the American taxpayer resulting from their labors.
Encourages all Americans to pay tribute to those who provide for the health and well-being of their family members, friends, and neighbors.
Supports the goals and ideals of National Family Caregivers Month.
